Uses of Package
blueMesh.display

  • Classes in blueMesh.display used by blueMesh.display 
    Class and Description
    BlueMeshService
    Main class of BlueMesh service
    ConnectedThread
    Class used to send data over sockets obtained by other Bluetooth devices
    RouterThread
    Class used to handle connectedThreads and route data coming into the connectedThreads and data generated by the user
    RouterThread.ConnectionSetupThread
    Class used to establish a connection over a socket to a device
    SearchThread
    Class used to search for other devices
